product-detail.error-value-input: Please enter a voucher value between minValue and maxValue.

vouchertyp_range.info: Please enter a voucher value between minValue and maxValue.

purchase-voucher.currency-change: The purchase voucher  "name" was removed from cart.

link-voucher.added-later: The voucher will be added after you add something to your shopping cart.
link-voucher.added-now: The voucher has been added to your shopping cart.
link-voucher.voucher-not-found: The voucher with the code "voucherCode" could not be found.
link-voucher.voucher-not-active: The voucher is invalid and cannot be used.

list-table.cart-empty: Please add a product to your cart
list-table.title: My vouchers

warning.login-needed: Log in to see your vouchers.
warning.deactivated: This option has been deactivated by the shop operator.

purchase-voucher.title: Coupon
purchase-voucher.info-message-singular:
The voucher can only be redeemed after the order has been paid.
Your vouchers can also be found in your account
purchase-voucher.info-message-plural:
The vouchers can only be redeemed after the order has been paid.
Your vouchers can also be found in your account

finish.multipleRestValues: The following vouchers were used. If the remaining value is greater than 0 you can redeem these with your next order.
finish.singleRestValue: The voucher with the code %code% still has a remaining credit of %restValue%. You can redeem this with your next order.
finish.noSingleRestValue: The voucher with the code %code% has no remaining credit.

checkout.easy-coupon-product-price-out-of-range: The purchase voucher %name% in the shopping cart has an invalid value.
checkout.easy-coupon-purchase-voucher-deleted: The purchase voucher %name% was removed from cart because you changed the currency.
checkout.easy-coupon-purchase-voucher-without-val: The product %name% can only be added to the shopping cart via the detail page.
checkout.easy-coupon-payment-activation-state-err: The voucher %id% has not yet been paid for. Therefore it cannot be redeemed yet.
checkout.easy-coupon-conditions-error: The voucher %id% could not be redeemed because at least one condition does not apply.
checkout.easy-coupon-empty-cart-error: The voucher(s) has/have been removed from the shopping cart because the shopping cart is empty.
checkout.easy-coupon-credit-error: The credit of the voucher %id% is insufficient and can therefore not be redeemed.
checkout.easy-coupon-not-active-or-deleted-error: The voucher %id% is not active or has been deleted.
checkout.easy-coupon-already-redeemed-error: The voucher %id% has already been redeemed.
checkout.easy-coupon-individual-percental-redeeme: The individual, percentage voucher has already been redeemed.
checkout.easy-coupon-not-combine-error: The voucher %id% is not allowed to be combined with another vouchers.
checkout.easy-coupon-not-valid-error: The voucher %id% is no longer valid.

error.easy-coupon-product-price-out-of-range: The purchase voucher in the shopping cart has an invalid value. Please remove it to complete your order.
error.easy-coupon-purchase-voucher-deleted: The purchase voucher was removed from cart because you changed the currency.
error.easy-coupon-conditions-error: The voucher was removed from the shopping cart because at least one of the conditions does not apply.
